t: Proverbs 2
The Value of Wisdom
My*pn son, if you receive my words, And*ld treasure my commands within you,
So*ld that you incline your ear to wisdom, And*ild apply your heart to understanding;
Yes,*ld if you cry out for discernment, And*ild lift up your voice for understanding,
If*ld you seek her as silver, And*ld search for her as for*i hidden treasures;
Then*ld you will understand the fear of the Lord,*s And*ld find the knowledge of God.
For*ld the Lord*s gives wisdom; From*ld His mouth come*i knowledge and understanding;
He*ld stores up sound wisdom for the upright; He*ild is*i a shield to those who walk uprightly;
He*ld guards the paths of justice, And*ld preserves the way of His saints.
Then*ld you will understand righteousness and justice, Equity*ld and*i every good path.
When*ln wisdom enters your heart, And*ld knowledge is pleasant to your soul,
Discretion*ld will preserve you; Understanding*ld will keep you,
